data.text: And after these things I saw another angel come down from heaven, having great power; and the earth was lightened with his glory.
And he cried mightily with a strong voice, saying,
For all nations have drunk of the wine of the wrath of her fornication,
And I heard another voice from heaven, saying,
For her sins have reached unto heaven,
Reward her even as she rewarded you,
How much she hath glorified herself, and lived deliciously,
Therefore shall her plagues come in one day,
And the kings of the earth, who have committed fornication and lived deliciously with her,
Standing afar off for the fear of her torment,
And the merchants of the earth shall weep and mourn over her;
The merchandise of gold, and silver,
And cinnamon, and odours,
And the fruits that thy soul lusted after are departed from thee,
The merchants of these things, which were made rich by her,
and saying,
For in one hour so great riches is come to nought.
and cried
And they cast dust on their heads,
Rejoice over her, thou heaven,
And a mighty angel took up a stone like a great millstone, and cast it into the sea, saying,
And the voice of harpers, and musicians, and of pipers, and trumpeters, shall be heard no more at all in thee;
And the light of a candle shall shine no more at all in thee;
And in her was found the blood of prophets, and of saints,
